metadata.synopsis: Goblins are fighting. Abdirak runs away.

0.speaker: Abdirak
0.text: My interest is in pain - not death. I'll take no part in this.
0.context:
CinematicNodeContext: About to run away. InternalNodeContext: Battlestation was triggered in the goblin camp. Pain Priest picks up his things and leaves the camp.
NodeContext: Fleeing. Determined but also afraid.
